page.title: 06Pontins Holiday Camp(1)
page.content: Pontins is an international holiday camp. The Jersey Pontins is in Plemont St.Ouen. At the start of the season, which is May, most of the people that come are quite old, but during the middle of the season it is mostly families that come.Most the people come from England but some French people come also. The accomodation at Pontins is chalets with four beds. Every chalet has a kettle,a wardrobe and the more expensive chalets have a television. In July and August it is Â£74.OO a week for a child and Â£148.OO for adults.
